pages.index: ZumbaVibe - Dance Fitness Delight: Unleash Your Rhythm, Energize Your Soul | Elevate Your Workout Experience with Zumba's Dynamic Beats | Join the Dance Revolution for Fun, Fitness, and Joyful Living | Feel the Vibes, Move with Zest - Where Fitness Meets the Rhythm of Zumba | Your Ultimate Destination for High-Energy Zumba Classes and Fitness Fun | Dance, Sweat, Repeat - ZumbaVibe's Energetic Fusion of Exercise and Dance ZumbaVibe Home Why Choose Us? About Us Contact Us ZumbaVibeDANCE FITNESS Ignite Your Spirit, Move with ZumbaVibe: Where Rhythm and Fitness Unite in Harmony Get Started Directions 01 Zumba Basics 02 Zumba Toning 03 Aqua Zumba 04 Zumba Gold Beginners 01. What to Wear for a ZumbaVibe Class? All you need is your enthusiasm and comfortable workout gear! No special attire is required. Come ready to move and groove to the beat. Our classes are designed for everyone, and there's no need for any specialized equipment. Just bring your positive energy, and let the rhythm guide you to a fun and effective workout. See you on the dance floor! 02. Which Zumba Class is Ideal for Beginners? For those new to ZumbaVibe, we recommend starting with our Zumba Basics class. It's the perfect introduction to the energetic world of Zumba, providing a foundation in the basic moves and rhythms. Our experienced instructors will guide you through the steps, ensuring you have a blast while breaking a sweat. Join us to dance, laugh, and celebrate the joy of movement! 03. Should I Inform the Instructor if It's My First Zumba Class? Absolutely! Please let your instructor know if it's your first time attending a Zumba class. Our instructors are here to make your experience enjoyable and tailored to your fitness level. Informing them allows for personalized guidance and ensures you get the most out of your ZumbaVibe session. We're here to support your journey to a healthier, happier you! 04. Is it Necessary to Notify the Instructor if I Have Chronic Conditions or If I'm Currently Unwell? Yes, it's advisable to inform your instructor if you have any chronic conditions or are feeling unwell before the ZumbaVibe class. This information helps us modify the workout to suit your needs and ensures your safety during the session. Open communication allows us to provide alternatives or adjustments tailored to your well-being. Your health is our priority! Why Choose Us? Passionate Instructors: Choose us because our instructors aren't just experts in Zumba; they're passionate about bringing joy and fitness into your life through dance. Holistic Fitness Approach: Choose us because we embrace a holistic approach to fitness, incorporating not only physical activity but also the joy and energy of dance for overall well-being. Inclusive Community: Choose us because our studio is a welcoming space where our vibrant community encourages and uplifts each other in their fitness journey through the rhythm of ZumbaVibe. Diverse Class Selection: Choose us because our diverse class offerings cater to all fitness levels and interests, ensuring a perfect Zumba experience for everyone, whether you're a beginner or an experienced dancer. Start dancing today. Join Now Move more, it uplifts your spirits and energizes your soul. Student-Centric Philosophy: Our fundamental philosophy is dedicated to putting you, our valued student, at the core of everything we do. We continuously endeavor to exceed your expectations, ensuring your complete satisfaction at every step of your yoga journey. Consistent Dedication to Excellence: When you dance with ZumbaVibe, you're experiencing excellence. We are committed to providing you with the highest-quality Zumba experience, ensuring your well-being and joy in every session. Select your favorite and explore new rhythmic adventures. Our prices Subscription Subscription Newcomer 10 lessons 6 weeks 200 $ Morning afternoon 12 lessons 2 months 250 $ Standard 5 lessons 1 month 150 $ Standard + 10 lessons 1 month 180 $ Large 15 lessons 1 month 250 $ Contact us 179, 3rd Cross Rd, Byrasandra, Wilson Garden, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560041, India +91-781-3844003 ZumbaVibe@gmail.com I accept Privacy policy Send ZumbaVibe Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

About Us Contact Us Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to ZumbaVibe. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: ZumbaVibe@gmail.com ZumbaVibe Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
